ComicInfo.Summary: With a little help from his buddies in both Wetworks and the Wild C.A.TS, Backlash has Diane's essence transferred from the Daemonite, S'ryn, back into her comatose body and she wakes up.
ComicInfo.Writer: Brett Booth,Jeff Mariotte,Sean Ruffner,Sean Ruffner,Jeff Mariotte,Brett Booth
